MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G66 postcode area of Glasgow affecting properties in Redbrae Road and surrounding streets. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still investigating the fault on our equipment on Highfield Road affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6.15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4.30pm on Wednesday, 14 October 2020.
